description:
The 185 merino logo spray t-shirt for men is perfect for athletic mountain adventures when the going gets tough.

Its merino wool with extremely fine fibers feel soft and comfortable on the skin. Wool is ideal for endurance sports thanks to its temperature and moisture-regulating properties. As always, their merino wool comes from selected tasmanian farms, where their sheep enjoy an almost boundless habitat in a moderate climate. These optimum living conditions result in the high quality and functionality of the fine wool.

Stylish and color conscious, their long sleeve is available in on-trend colors with a cool print. Multi-colored twirled yarn additionally creates a cool look – for all the color-loving sheep in the world! The 185 merino logo spray t-shirt for men is extremely versatile and an absolute must for any tour!
name: Ortovox 185 Merino Logo Spray T-Shirt - Mens
